alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:31PM HST until January 12 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR MAUI AND BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR ALL OTHER AREAS EXCEPT WINDWARD BIG ISLAND... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts near 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kohala; Kona
